regen.absent_element: execution time constraint under fault conditions and integration with redundancy management
regen.new_specification: The Continuous BIT, along with Redundancy Management and Scheduler operations, shall maintain execution under 3 milliseconds within the 50Hz rategroup when processing faults.
The system shall ensure Continuous BIT executes within 3 milliseconds under fault conditions.
Under fault conditions, Continuous BIT, along with Redundancy Management and Scheduler operations running in the 50Hz rategroup, shall take less than 3 milliseconds.

label: Continuous BIT shall take less than 3 milliseconds while processing faults.
